trans-unit.source: Represents an instance of a SharePoint project item, implemented by the SharePoint project system.
trans-unit.target: 表示由 SharePoint 项目系统实现的 SharePoint 项目项的实例。

trans-unit.source: Any folder in a SharePoint project that contains a project item file is assumed to be a SharePoint project item node.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含项目项文件的 SharePoint 项目中的任何文件夹被假定为 SharePoint 项目项节点。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the file that is launched when a SharePoint project item node in **Solution Explorer** is activated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当激活“解决方案资源管理器”中的 SharePoint 项目项节点时所启动的文件。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a file.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: A SharePoint extension can either set this property or handle the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.Open> event to control the project item folder node activation behavior.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 扩展可以设置此属性，或者处理<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.Open>事件来控制项目项文件夹节点激活行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets the information that enables project item extensions to persist custom data across Visual Studio sessions.
trans-unit.target: 获取允许项目项扩展在 Visual Studio 会话间保留自定义数据的信息。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the extension data.
trans-unit.target: 表示扩展数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using this property to persist data in a project item, see [Saving Data in Extensions of the SharePoint Project System](/visualstudio/sharepoint/saving-data-in-extensions-of-the-sharepoint-project-system.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用此属性将数据保持在项目项的详细信息，请参阅[扩展 SharePoint 项目系统中保存数据](/visualstudio/sharepoint/saving-data-in-extensions-of-the-sharepoint-project-system.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the activation dependencies that are added to the feature that includes this Sharepoint Project Item.
trans-unit.target: 获取添加到包含此 SharePoint 项目项的功能的激活依赖项。

trans-unit.source: An object representing feature activation dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能激活依赖项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key/value pairs that are added to the feature that includes this SharePoint Project Item.
trans-unit.target: 获取添加到功能（该功能包含此 SharePoint 项目项）的键/值对。

trans-unit.source: An object representing feature property values.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示功能属性值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a feature receiver, if the SharePoint project item requires it.
trans-unit.target: 获取功能接收器（如果 SharePoint 项目项需要）。

trans-unit.source: At package time, this feature receiver is added to the feature that includes this SharePoint project item.
trans-unit.target: 打包时，此功能接收器添加到包含此 SharePoint 项目项的功能中。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature receiver.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示功能接收器的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all files in the project under the SharePoint project item folder node and its subfolders.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SharePoint 项目项文件夹节点及其子文件夹下的项目中的所有文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of files.
trans-unit.target: 文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a globally unique identifier for this instance of the SharePoint project item.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 SharePoint 项目项实例的全球唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: A GUID value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 GUID 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a SharePoint project item folder opens.
trans-unit.target: 在打开 SharePoint 项目项文件夹时发生。

trans-unit.source: To "open" a SharePoint project item folder, you can either double-click it, press the **Enter** key, or execute an "Open" command.
trans-unit.target: 若要"打开"SharePoint 项目项文件夹，可以双击它，按**Enter**键，或执行"打开"命令。

trans-unit.source: A project item type provider or extension can override the default behavior by setting <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointProjectItemOpenEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 项目项类型提供程序或扩展可以替代默认行为，通过设置<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointProjectItemOpenEventArgs.Handled%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: By default, the SharePoint project item uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.DefaultFile%2A> instance and opens a default editor for it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，SharePoint 项目项使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.DefaultFile%2A>实例并打开它的默认编辑器。

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.DefaultFile%2A> property in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.Open> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.DefaultFile%2A>中的属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem.Open>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the object representing the SharePoint project item type.
trans-unit.target: 获取对表示 SharePoint 项目项类型的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a project item type.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示项目项类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Get the collection of project output references belonging to this project item.
trans-unit.target: 获取属于此项目项的项目输出引用的集合。

trans-unit.source: Referenced projects are built and their primary outputs are packaged along with the project item.
trans-unit.target: 将生成引用的项目，并且其主输出将随项目项一起打包。

trans-unit.source: A collection of project output references.
trans-unit.target: 项目输出引用的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object that you can use to get or set name/value pairs that are saved in a project user file, such as files with a .csproj.user or .vbproj.user extension.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 对象，可使用该对象获取或设置在项目用户文件（例如，带有 .csproj.user 或 .vbproj.user 扩展名的文件）中保存的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: An object representing project user file data.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示项目用户文件数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Project user files are user-specific and generally not submitted to a source control system.
trans-unit.target: 项目用户文件是特定于用户的和通常不提交到源代码管理系统。

trans-unit.source: The key in the dictionary is the name and value is the value.
trans-unit.target: 字典中的键是名称和值是的值。

trans-unit.source: Get a collection of safe control entries that must be deployed along with this SharePoint project item when it is deployed.
trans-unit.target: 获取必须随此 SharePoint 项目项一起部署的安全控制项的集合。

trans-unit.source: These entries are added to the package that references the SharePoint project item.
trans-unit.target: 将这些项添加到引用 SharePoint 项目项的包中。

trans-unit.source: A collection of safe control entries.
trans-unit.target: 安全控制项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection includes virtual files.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含虚拟文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Virtual files do not have to exist at design time.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟文件不必在设计时存在。

trans-unit.source: At packaging time MSBuild tasks need to ensure the file is present for the packaging to suceed.
trans-unit.target: 在打包时 MSBuild 任务需要确保准备的文件有助于打包成功。

trans-unit.source: A collection of virtual files.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟文件的集合。
